items.name: Victario's Influence
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed AoE Gems
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Generosity
Socketed Gems have 45% increased Reservation Efficiency
136% increased Evasion and Energy Shield
31% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
14% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills
cosmeticMods: Has Sentinel Jacket Skin. You can reclaim this by shift-clicking this item.
flavourText: "Every life is a story.
If you're not writing your own,
you'd better know who's writing it for you!"
- Victario, the People's Poet

properties.name: Lightning, Attack, AoE, Duration, Melee, Strike, Aura

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a melee attack, and causes lightning to strike a targeted location or nearby enemy, dealing damage in an area. Each target can only be hit once by this skill. Hitting an enemy grants an aura, giving you and your allies additional lightning damage for a duration. Requires a Sword, Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.
explicitMods: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Base duration is 4.00 seconds
+0.6 metres to radius
20% less Area Damage
Lightning strikes 1 target
Aura grants 12 to 220 added Lightning Damage
Aura grants 19% chance to Shock
Aura grants 5% increased Attack and Cast Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that adds lightning damage to the attacks of you and your allies, and makes your spells deal more lightning damage.
explicitMods: +2 metres to radius
5% increased effect of Aura
You and nearby allies deal 17 to 267 additional Lightning Damage with Attacks
You and nearby allies deal 21% more Spell Lightning Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Targets an allied player to apply a buff which links you to them for a duration. While linked, they use your main hand critical strike chance. If the target dies while linked, you will also die. This skill cannot be triggered, or used by Totems, Traps, or Mines.
explicitMods: Base duration is 10.00 seconds
20% increased Skill Effect Duration
Linked target has +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Linked target's Main Hand Critical Strike Chance is equal to yours

Link breaks if target leaves range or line of sight for 4 seconds
Maximum 1 Link from any source per target
You die if Linked target dies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
